so 33 kills in 1 game? and what happens if we go over 33 kills do we still get the icon
Doesn't have to be in one game--it's 33 across games. You will still get the icon if you go over, so feel free to flay that 34th thresh into the abyss
Across games as only all the rounds or as in I can play a game, then lose both rounds, then play another?
Across games--doesn't matter how many rounds or games. You just have to dunk at least 33 threshes over the course of the event
Dark star can have a gamemode, but graves can't have a... oh.
so 33 kills by your self or as a team? or 33 kills together from your games. and for the other free icon , says with two friends , so premade? or any game counts.
33 kills yourself, across games. The other icon takes a full premade team of 3 with friends.
When you mean 33kills yourself could i still play with a premade and have 33kills myself and still obtain that icon? Or do i have to play solo and get 33kills?

You don't have to play solo. You could play with whoever, over however many games, as long as you destroy 33 threshes. All I ask of you is 33 personally-obliterated threshes over the course of the entire event

Do they have to be on your friends list friends, or is a premade of 3 sufficient?

i.e. can a friend on my list invite me and a friend of theirs who isn't my friend and have everyone get the icon, or would only the host who is friends with everyone get the icon while the two people they invited would miss out?
A premade is enough, so everybody would get the icon there
So for example, if I were to play 3 of the featured games and i got 11 kills in each of said games, would I be eligible to get the icon?
ya
